caption.p:
Comparison of chorotypes between “Gabelli, 1894”
18 and “Salinitro et al., 2018”
19 . Some chorotypes have been grouped into a single category, such as Naturalised (Naturalised + Cultivated), Est-European (Eurosiberian + Eurocaucasian), and Cosmopolitan (Cosmopolitan + Subcosmopolitan). The statistical difference in the distribution of chorotypes was tested by G-test ( p < 0.01).
